keyMoments.description: Activates Gear 2 to battle the giant Moria who has absorbed 1,000 shadows
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy immediately using his strongest form to combat the threat

keyMoments.description: Survives being crushed in Moria's Black Box technique thanks to his rubber body
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the fundamental advantage of the Gomu Gomu no Mi against blunt force attacks

keyMoments.description: Combines Gear 2 and Gear 3 simultaneously for the first time, creating Gigant Jet Shell
keyMoments.significance: Represents a major evolution in Luffy's fighting abilities and willingness to take extreme risks to save everyone

keyMoments.description: Defeats Gecko Moria with Gomu Gomu no Gigant Jet Shell, forcing him to release all shadows
keyMoments.significance: Achieves victory over a Warlord of the Sea and saves all shadowless victims from death at dawn

keyMoments.description: Begins to vanish in the sunlight as dawn arrives and the building collapses
keyMoments.significance: Creates a cliffhanger ending despite the victory over Moria

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Gigant Jet Shell
abilities.description: A combination technique using both Gear 2 and Gear 3 simultaneously, creating a massive high-speed projectile attack

keyMoments.description: Activates Shadow's Asgard and absorbs 1,000 shadows, transforming into a giant
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the ultimate technique of the Kage Kage no Mi and Moria's final trump card

keyMoments.description: Traps Luffy in Black Box and crushes him repeatedly
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates another application of his shadow manipulation abilities

keyMoments.description: Is defeated by Luffy's Gigant Jet Shell and loses control of all 1,000 shadows
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of his reign over Thriller Bark and the conclusion of the main conflict

keyMoments.description: Warns Luffy about the dangers of the New World after his defeat
keyMoments.significance: Provides foreshadowing for future arcs and hints at his traumatic past in the New World

reveals.description: Demonstrates the full power of Shadow's Asgard by absorbing 1,000 shadows, but reveals he cannot maintain control under sustained attack
His warning about the New World hints at personal trauma and the loss of his original crew

abilities.name: Shadow's Asgard
abilities.description: Ultimate technique of the Kage Kage no Mi that allows Moria to absorb thousands of shadows into his body, gaining immense size and strength

abilities.name: Black Box
abilities.description: Creates a prison of Brick Bats that form a box around the target and crushes them

relationships.description: Defeated by Luffy in battle, acknowledges his strength but warns him about greater dangers ahead

name: Charlotte Lola
nameJapanese: シャーロット・ローラ

keyMoments.description: Demonstrates extraordinary courage by refusing to flee Thriller Bark despite being shadowless and facing certain death at dawn
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the theme of loyalty and sacrifice, choosing to support her crew over self-preservation

keyMoments.description: Witnesses the return of all shadows including her own as Moria is defeated
keyMoments.significance: Sees the resolution of the shadow crisis and the salvation of all shadowless victims

keyMoments.description: Reacts in shock as Luffy combines Gear 2 and Gear 3 simultaneously
keyMoments.significance: Witnesses Luffy's innovation and the risk he's taking

keyMoments.description: Begins to vanish in the sunlight as the building collapses and exposes him to dawn
keyMoments.significance: Creates dramatic tension as even victory hasn't saved them yet

keyMoments.description: Begins to vanish in the sunlight as the building collapses and exposes her to dawn
keyMoments.significance: Creates dramatic tension as even victory hasn't saved them yet

keyMoments.description: Begins to vanish in the sunlight as the building collapses and exposes him to dawn
keyMoments.significance: Creates dramatic tension as even victory hasn't saved them yet

keyMoments.description: Exclaims in shock when Luffy combines both Gear 2 and Gear 3 at the same time
keyMoments.significance: Provides reaction to highlight how unprecedented and dangerous Luffy's technique is
